content: CF 812 WD low-pressure door and window foam Low-pressure foam for air-sealing, filling and insulating doors and windows without warping the frames or jambs ### Categories: Home > Products > Construction chemicals > Foams- - - ### FEATURES:Features Remains flexible – Ideal for use in movement joints Acts as thermal insulation Helps restricts air infiltration and creates a water-resistant seal Tested as a low-pressure insulating material for window and door frames (AAMA 812) Applications Insulating window frames Sealing door frames Restricting air infiltration within attics Vertical wall joints Head of wall For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Foam Yield (up to): 1.3 ft³ Approx. tack free time (at 74°F / 50% rel. humidity): 10 min Approx. cut time (at 23°C / 50% rel. Humidity): 15 min Technical Data | Foam Yield (up to) | 1.3 ft³ | Approx. tack free time (at 74°F / 50% rel. humidity) | 10 min | Approx. cut time (at 23°C / 50% rel. Humidity) | 15 min | Color | off-white | Temperature resistance range | -22 - 176 °F | Application temperature range | 41 - 95 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 227975 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - Package Size 1 pc - 3413889 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD 1 case - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 12x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 3434297 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD 1 case + 1 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 12x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 1x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 1x Cleaner CFR-1 - 3414916 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD 3 cases - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 36x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 3422085 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD 3 cases + 1 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 36x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 1x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3422086 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD 6 cases + 1 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 72x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 1x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3422087 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD 9 cases + 2 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 108x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 2x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3422088 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD 16 cases + 2 disp - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 192x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 2x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3542181 - CF 812 Pallet - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 384x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 3549629 - CF 812 Pallet (32 Cases + 2 Long Dispensers) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 384x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 2x Extra long foam dispenser CF DS-L - 3549630 - CF 812 Pallet (32 Cases + 4 Dispensers) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 384x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD - 4x Foam dispenser CF DS1 - 3414918 - Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD 32 cases - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 384x Pro insulating foam CF 812 WD
